Stellar DevKit

Developer suite for Stellar: Agent Kit SDK, x402 payments, CLI scaffolder, MCP.

Packages

  • stellar-agent-kitUnified DeFi SDK â€“ StellarAgentKit (DEX swap/quote, config)
  • x402-stellar-sdkHTTP 402 payment-gated APIs with Stellar payments
  • create-stellar-devkit-appCLI to scaffold Agent Kit or x402 API apps
  • stellar-devkit-mcpMCP server for LLM tools and snippets

Networks

NetworkHorizonSoroban RPC
testnethttps://horizon-testnet.stellar.orghttps://soroban-testnet.stellar.org
mainnethttps://horizon.stellar.orghttps://soroban-rpc.mainnet.stellar.gateway.fm

Code snippets

import { StellarAgentKit, MAINNET_ASSETS } from "stellar-agent-kit";

const agent = new StellarAgentKit(process.env.SECRET_KEY!, "testnet");
await agent.initialize();

const quote = await agent.dexGetQuote(
  { contractId: MAINNET_ASSETS.XLM.contractId },
  { contractId: MAINNET_ASSETS.USDC.contractId },
  "10000000"
);
const result = await agent.dexSwap(quote);
console.log(result.hash);
